summary.span: 在可滚动的网格中显示 ADO.NET 数据。

span.span: Displays ADO.NET data in a scrollable grid.

summary.span: 控件取代了 控件并添加了功能；但是，可以选择保留 控件以实现向后兼容并供将来使用。

span.span: The control replaces and adds functionality to the control; however, the control is retained for both backward compatibility and future use, if you choose.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示子表的类似于 Web 的链接。The displays Web-like links to child tables. 您可以单击链接以导航到子表。You can click on a link to navigate to the child table. 当显示子表时，可通过单击导航回父表的标题中显示后退按钮。When a child table is displayed, a back button appears in the caption that can be clicked to navigate back to the parent table. 在标题下面及更高版本的列标题显示的父行中的数据。The data from the parent rows is displayed below the caption and above the column headers. 可以通过单击右侧的后退按钮的按钮隐藏父行信息。You can hide the parent row information by clicking the button to the right of the back button. 若要显示的表中在运行时，使用方法以设置和属性设置为有效的数据源。To display a table in the at run time, use the method to set the and properties to a valid data source. 以下数据源是有效的：The following data sources are valid: - 一个 A - 一个 A - 一个 A - 一个 A - 一维数组A single dimension array - 实现任何组件接口Any component that implements the interface - 实现任何组件接口Any component that implements the interface 有关详细信息类，请参阅[数据集、 数据表和数据视图](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/index.md)。For more information about the class, see [DataSets, DataTables, and DataViews](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/index.md). 可以创建一个网格，使用户能够编辑数据，但不能通过添加新行作为数据源，并设置属性设置为`false`。You can create a grid that enables users to edit data but prevents them from adding new rows by using a as the data source and setting the property to `false`. 数据源进一步由对象。Data sources are further managed by objects. 每个表在数据源可以从窗体的返回。For each table in a data source, a can be returned from the form's . 例如，可以确定通过返回关联的数据源包含的行数对象的属性。For example, you can determine the number of rows contained by a data source by returning the associated object's property. 若要验证数据，请使用表示数据及控件事件的基础对象。To validate data, use the underlying objects that represent data and their events. 例如，如果数据来自何处中，使用和事件。For example, if the data comes from a in a , use the and events. > [!NOTE] > 因为可以自定义的列数 (通过添加或删除的成员) 和行可以按列排序并属性值不能保证对应于和中的索引。Because the number of columns can be customized (by adding or deleting members of the ) and the rows can be sorted by column, the and property values cannot be guaranteed to correspond to and indexes in a . 因此应避免使用这些属性在事件验证数据。Therefore you should avoid using those properties in the event to validate data. 若要确定选择哪个单元格，请使用属性。To determine which cell is selected, use the property. 使用更改任何单元格的值属性，这可能需要的单元格的行和列索引，或者单个。Change the value of any cell by using the property, which can take either the row and column indexes of the cell, or a single . 监视器事件来检测在用户选择另一个单元格时。Monitor the event to detect when the user selects another cell. 若要确定用户所单击的控件的部分，请使用中的方法事件。To determine which part of the control the user clicked, use the method in the event. 方法将返回对象，它包含的行和列的被单击的区域。The method returns a object, which contains the row and column of a clicked area. 若要管理在运行时控件的外观，用于设置颜色和标题属性的多个属性可供选择，包括， ， ，依次类推。To manage the appearance of the control at run time, several properties for setting the color and caption attributes are available, including the , , , and so on. 可以通过创建进一步修改显示网格 （或网格） 的外观对象并将它们添加到，这通过访问属性。The appearance of the displayed grid (or grids) can be further modified by creating objects and adding them to the , which is accessed through the property. 例如，如果设置为包含三个对象，可以添加三个到集合的对象，每个表的一个对象。For example, if the is set to a containing three objects, you can add three objects to the collection, one for each table. 以同步每个对象使用，请设置的到的。To synchronize each object with a , set the of the to the of the . 有关绑定到一个数组对象的详细信息，请参阅属性。For more information about binding to an array of objects, see the property. 若要创建自定义的视图的表，创建的实例或类，并向其中添加对象通过访问属性。To create a customized view of a table, create an instance of a or class and add the object to the accessed through the property. 这两个类均从 继承。Both classes inherit from . 对于每个列样式，请设置到你想要在网格中显示的列。For each column style, set the to the of a column that you want to show in the grid. 若要隐藏某一列，设置其有效以外的。To hide a column, set its to something other than a valid . 若要设置格式的文本列，设置的属性中找到的值之一[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)并[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。To format the text of a column, set the property of the to one of the values found in [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). 若要将绑定对象类型必须为强类型化对象的数组，包含公共属性。To bind the to a strongly typed array of objects, the object type must contain public properties. 若要创建显示数组时，设置属性设置为`typename[]`其中`typename`被替换为对象类型的名称。To create a that displays the array, set the property to `typename[]` where `typename` is replaced by the name of the object type. 另请注意，属性是区分大小写; 必须完全匹配的类型名称。Also note that the property is case-sensitive; the type name must be matched exactly. 请参阅属性有关的示例。See the property for an example. 此外可以绑定到。You can also bind the to an . 一项功能是可以包含多个类型的对象，但只能绑定到此列表的第一项与相同类型的列表中的所有项时。A feature of the is that it can contain objects of multiple types, but the can only bind to such a list when all items in the list are of the same type as the first item. 这意味着所有对象必须都是同一类型，或者它们必须从列表中的第一项与相同的类继承。This means that all objects must either be of the same type, or they must inherit from the same class as the first item in the list. 例如，如果在列表中的第一项，第二个项目会(它是从)。For example, if the first item in a list is a , the second item could be a (which inherits from ). 另一方面，如果第一项是，第二个对象不能为。If, on the other hand, the first item is a , the second object cannot be a . 此外，时它所绑定必须具有在其中的项。Further, the must have items in it when it is bound. 一个空将导致一个空网格。An empty will result in an empty grid. 此外中的对象必须包含公共属性。In addition, the objects in the must contain public properties. 绑定到时，将的到"ArrayList"（类型名称）。When binding to an , set the of the to "ArrayList" (the type name). 每个，可以设置颜色和标题特性来重写的设置控件。For each , you can set color and caption attributes that override the settings for the control. 但是，如果未设置这些属性，默认使用控件的设置。However, if those properties are not set, the settings for the control are used by default. 以下属性可通过重写属性：The following properties can be overridden by properties: - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 若要自定义单个列的外观，请添加对象添加到，这通过访问每个属性。To customize the appearance of individual columns, add objects to the , which is accessed through the property of each . 以同步每个与中，将到的。To synchronize each with a in the , set the to the of a . 构造时，还可以设置一个格式设置字符串，指定的列方式显示数据。When constructing a , you can also set a formatting string that specifies how the column displays data. 例如，可以指定此列使用短日期格式显示表中包含的日期。For example, you can specify that the column use a short-date format to display dates contained in the table. > [!CAUTION] > 始终创建对象，并将其添加到添加之前对象添加到。Always create objects and add them to the before adding objects to the . 当添加一个空使用一个有效值到集合中，为你自动生成的对象。When you add an empty with a valid value to the collection, objects are automatically generated for you. 如果你尝试添加新因此，将引发异常具有重复的对象值到。Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new objects with duplicate values to the . > [!NOTE] > 控件取代了 控件并添加了功能；但是，可以选择保留 控件以实现向后兼容并供将来使用。The control replaces and adds functionality to the control; however, the control is retained for both backward compatibility and future use, if you choose. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件与 DataGrid 控件之间的区别](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/differences-between-the-windows-forms-datagridview-and-datagrid-controls.md)。For more information, see [Differences Between the Windows Forms DataGridView and DataGrid Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/differences-between-the-windows-forms-datagridview-and-datagrid-controls.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 Windows 窗体包含两个对象，和一个与两个表。The following code example creates a Windows form, a containing two objects, and a that relates the two tables. 若要显示的数据然后将控件绑定到通过方法。To display the data, a control is then bound to the through the method. 在窗体上的按钮更改通过创建两个网格的外观对象和设置到每个对象的之一的对象。A button on the form changes the appearance of the grid by creating two objects and setting the of each object to a of one of the objects. 该示例还包含中的代码使用的事件方法打印列、 行和已被单击的网格的一部分。The example also contains code in the event that uses the method to print the column, row, and part of the grid that has been clicked. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果包含多个源的数据，应设置到其中一个源。If a contains multiple sources of data, you should set the to one of the sources. 例如，如果是或，其中包含三个表名为`Customers`， `Orders`，并`OrderDetails`，必须指定一个要将绑定到的表。For example, if the is a or that contains three tables named `Customers`, `Orders`, and `OrderDetails`, you must specify one of the tables to bind to. 如果或只包含一个，则应设置到的。If the or contains only one , you should set the to the of that . 如果设置为，其中包含对象的父表将显示每个行标题中加号 （+）。If the is set to a that contains objects, parent tables will appear with a plus sign (+) in each row header. 单击加号将导致出现，其中包含指向子表的节点。Clicking the plus sign causes a node to appear that contains links to child tables. 例如，如果包含两个对象命名`Customers`并`Orders`，并设置到`Customers`表会使每一行上显示父表，其中显示一个加号标头。For example, if a contains two objects named `Customers` and `Orders`, setting the to the `Customers` table causes the to display a parent table with a plus sign visible on each row header. 如果设置为`Orders`，但是，行标题将为空白。If the is set to `Orders`, however, the row headers will be blank. 如果是， ，集合或数组中，设置属性引发异常。If the is a , , collection, or array, setting the property throws an exception. > [!NOTE] > 在运行时，必须使用方法来重置属性。At run time, you must use the method to reset the property. 但是，属性仅可以重置为有效的表名称的任何时候。However, the property alone can be reset at any time to a valid table name. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置并的属性控件。The following code example sets the and properties of a control. summary.span: 获取或设置网格所显示数据的数据源。

span.span: Gets or sets the data source that the grid is displaying data for.
An object that functions as a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在运行时，使用方法以设置和属性。At run time, use the method to set the and properties. 以下数据源是有效的：The following data sources are valid: - 一个 A - 一个 A - 一个 A - 一个 A - 实现任何组件接口Any component that implements the interface - 实现任何组件接口Any component that implements the interface 请参阅类概述的数据源的详细信息。See the class overview for more information on data sources. 如果引用包含多个表，则必须设置一个字符串，指定该表要绑定到的属性。If the reference contains more than one table, you must set the property a string that specifies the table to bind to. 例如，如果是或，其中包含三个表名为`Customers`， `Orders`，并`OrderDetails`，必须指定要绑定到的表。For example, if the is a or that contains three tables named `Customers`, `Orders`, and `OrderDetails`, you must specify the table to bind to. 设置未实现的对象接口或将导致引发异常的网格。Setting the to an object that does not implement the interface or an will cause the grid to throw an exception. 可以创建一个网格，使用户能够编辑数据，但不能通过添加新行作为数据源，并设置属性设置为`false`。You can create a grid that enables users to edit data but prevents them from adding new rows by using a as the data source and setting the property to `false`. 若要将绑定对象类型必须为强类型化对象的数组，包含公共属性。To bind the to a strongly typed array of objects, the object type must contain public properties. 若要创建显示数组时，设置属性设置为`typename`其中`typename`被替换为对象类型的名称。To create a that displays the array, set the property to `typename` where `typename` is replaced by the name of the object type. 另请注意，属性是区分大小写; 必须完全匹配的类型名称。Also note that the property is case-sensitive; the type name must be matched exactly. 请参阅属性有关的示例。See the property for an example. 此外可以绑定到。You can also bind the to an . 一项功能是可以包含多个类型的对象，但只能绑定到此列表的第一项与相同类型的列表中的所有项时。A feature of the is that it can contain objects of multiple types, but the can only bind to such a list when all items in the list are of the same type as the first item. 这意味着所有对象必须都是同一类型，或者它们必须从列表中的第一项与相同的类继承。This means that all objects must either be of the same type, or they must inherit from the same class as the first item in the list. 例如，如果在列表中的第一项，第二个项目会(它是从)。For example, if the first item in a list is a , the second item could be a (which inherits from ). 另一方面，如果第一项是，第二个对象不能为。If, on the other hand, the first item is a , the second object cannot be a . 此外，时它所绑定必须具有在其中的项。Further, the must have items in it when it is bound. 一个空将导致一个空网格。An empty will result in an empty grid. 此外中的对象必须包含公共属性。In addition, the objects in the must contain public properties. 绑定到时，将的到"ArrayList"（类型名称）。When binding to an , set the of the to "ArrayList" (the type name). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置，并需要时， ，若要将绑定同时和。The following code example shows how to set the , and when needed, the , to bind a to both a and a . 该示例还演示如何返回数据源从。The example also shows how to return data sources from the . span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在只读模式下，滚动网格，可以展开或折叠节点，依此类推。In read-only mode, the grid can be scrolled, nodes can be expanded or collapsed, and so on. 但是，任何添加、 编辑或删除可能需要的位置。However, no additions, edits, or deletes can take place. 还有可以设置为 true，以防止数据按列由列所编辑的属性。The also has a property that can be set to true to prevent data from being edited, on a column-by-column basis. 可以设置为 true，如果你想要禁止用户编辑直接在数据。The can be set to true if you want to prohibit the user from editing the data directly in the . 例如，你可能想要允许用户查看所有列在表中，但允许他们编辑特定字段只能通过不同窗体上的控件。For example, you might want to let users to see all columns in a table, but allow them to edit specific fields only through controls on a different form. ## Examples 下面的代码示例切换属性。The following code example toggles the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可见列的数目可以具体取决于它们的宽度更改。The number of visible columns can change depending on their width. 例如，如果设置了所有列的默认宽度，但新列的宽度设置为大两次，可以通过至少一种减少可见的列数。For example, if a default width for all columns is set, but the width of a new column is set twice as large, the number of visible columns can be reduced by at least one. ## Examples 下面的代码示例返回可见的列数。The following code example returns the number of visible columns.
